text: The Diamondback Scout is a cheap combat vessel by Lakon Spaceways, also suitable for exploration. It's known for its exceptional mobility and stealth capabilities, with two Class 1 and two Class 2 hardpoints. It has a default jump range of 11.35 LY, upgradable to 30.4 LY, and a cargo capacity of up to 32 tons.

The Diamondback Scout has a hull mass of 170 tons, armour rating of 216, shields of 92 MJ, and a heat capacity of 346. It measures 39.0m x 24.3m x 12.3m and has a top speed of 286 m/s (upgradable to 329 m/s) and a boost speed of 384 m/s (upgradable to 441 m/s).

The Diamondback Scout has four utility mounts, two small hardpoints (max Class 1), and two medium hardpoints (max Class 2). It also has two Class 1, one Class 2, and three Class 3 internal compartments.

The Diamondback Scout's default outfitting includes a Power Plant (Class 4, Grade E), Thrusters (Class 4, Grade E), Frame Shift Drive (Class 4, Grade E), Life Support (Class 2, Grade E), Power Distributor (Class 3, Grade E), Sensors (Class 2, Grade E), and a Fuel Tank (Class 4, Grade C).

The Diamondback Scout's default internal compartments include a Shield Generator (Class 3, Grade E), Advanced Docking Computer (Class 1, Grade E), Supercruise Assist (Class 1, Grade E), and a Passenger Rack (Class 1, Grade I).
